title: MainMC插件重载时报错
author: Ajsjsj
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-2-14 14:29 编辑 

>MainMC reload
[09:17:53] [Server thread/ERROR]: Cannot load plugins\MainMC\config.yml
org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException: while parsing a block mapping
 in 'string', line 248, column 1:
    database-name: "database"
    ^
expected <block end>, but found Scalar
 in 'string', line 689, column 43:
     ... commands-message: "&r指令不存在. 输入 "/help" 来看看你是不是输错指令了."

expected <block end>, but found Scalar

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content:
请在主楼补充编辑不要连楼。
另外任意基础插件如Essentials/X/CMI均不能热重载
会导致配置出现问题
